mapper.select: select temp.* from core_tree_info temp join core_tree_info temp_1 on temp_1.TREE_ID=#{mainId} and temp.TREE_LEFT > temp_1.TREE_LEFT and temp.TREE_RIGHT < temp_1.TREE_RIGHT order by temp.TREE_LEFT
mapper.delete: delete temp from core_tree_info temp join core_tree_info temp_1 on temp_1.TREE_ID=#{mainId} and temp.TREE_LEFT >= temp_1.TREE_LEFT and temp.TREE_RIGHT <= temp_1.TREE_RIGHT
